name: Croc Game
description:
Croc game is a simple demo prototype, created to prove the use of my very rudimentary croc engine, something capable of creating simple 2d games and projects.
In the game you play as john croc a character with no distinctive personality traits,  either venturing though a set of random stages or trying to get the highest score in battle mode, fighting against  waves or levels coated in ninjas, frogs, and mushroom men, to eventually beat your previous top score .

controls :

WASD - to move
Mouse move - to move arming direction
Space / mouse left - to shoot or pickup gun
enter / mouse right - to drop gun
0 - to enter debug
